tool_description: Extracts comprehensive property characteristics and details from property records using address or MLS ID.

property_address.description: Full street address of the subject property

include_tax_records.description: Whether to include tax assessment data

error_messages: Property not found: The provided address or MLS ID does not match any property records. Verify the address format and spelling.
Incomplete property data: Essential property characteristics are missing from records. Try using both address and MLS ID for better results.
Access denied: Unable to retrieve tax records due to privacy restrictions. Set include_tax_records to false and retry.
usage: Provide either property_address or mls_id (or both for best results). Optionally include tax records. Returns detailed property characteristics needed for valuation analysis.

square_footage.description: Total living area in square feet

bathrooms.description: Number of bathrooms including partial baths

property_type.description: Property type (single family, condo, townhouse, etc.)
